code: import{getFilename}from"./AssetUris";export function isImageType(type){return /^(jpeg|jpg|gif|png|bmp|webp|heic)$/i.test(type);}export function getImageInfoAsync(url){return new Promise(function(resolve,reject){var img=new Image();img.onerror=reject;img.onload=function(){resolve({name:getFilename(url),width:img.naturalWidth,height:img.naturalHeight});};img.src=url;});}
